channel.title: btc on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in btc on Barefoot Rob

item.title: unconfirmed transaction
item.description:
23:34 Tuesday 16 January 2018 JST I used blockchain.info to send my almost-one bitcoin to a guy and used their suggested fee… and it has not confirmed after 13 hours. https://blockchain.info/tx/b92c3e8166a44fecef691a14fb20f5f94088b66c2dc4009dee4f5f3365941573
Now that I have this problem, I see https://bitcoinfees.earn.com/ suggests fees to get transactions through quickly. So I will use that next time, but … dang not sure when next time will be haha. 11:38 Wednesday 17 January 2018 JST The transaction confirmed after nearly 24 hours.

item.title: bitcoin donations accepted
item.description: 04:48 Wednesday 14 October 2015 JST https://blockchain.info/address/13iVWWESXnHbWw2CzvSPG7JR5TJVHnAdzk Headin’ to OZ now, wearing a bitcoin shirt, but I don’t have a bitcoin address handy.
